         <article class="ipl-zebra-list__item news-article">
          <header class="news-article__header">
           <h2 class="news-article__title">
            <a class="tracked-offsite-link" data-page-action="offsite-thewrap" data-page-const="" data-page-type="" data-ref="nwc_art_hd" data-subpage-type="" href="https://www.thewrap.com/peaky-blinders-finale-movie-length-dry-run/" onclick="window.imdb.trackOffsiteLink(this)" rel="" target="_blank">
             ‘Peaky Blinders’ to Air Feature-Length Finale as ‘Dry Run’ for Film Spinoff
            </a>
           </h2>
           <ul class="news-article__header-detail ipl-inline-list">
            <li class="ipl-inline-list__item news-article__date">
             23 March 2022
            </li>
            <li class="ipl-inline-list__item news-article__author">
             by Dessi Gomez
            </li>
            <li class="ipl-inline-list__item news-article__source">
             <a class="tracked-offsite-link" data-page-action="offsite-thewrap" data-page-const="" data-page-type="" data-ref="nwc_art_src" data-subpage-type="" href="https://www.thewrap.com/peaky-blinders-finale-movie-length-dry-run/" onclick="window.imdb.trackOffsiteLink(this)" rel="" target="_blank">
              The Wrap
             </a>
            </li>
           </ul>
          </header>
          <section class="news-article__body">
           <img alt="‘Peaky Blinders’ to Air Feature-Length Finale as ‘Dry Run’ for Film Spinoff" class="news-article__image" src="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkzNjEzMDEzMF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDI0MjE4MjE@._V1_SY150_CR0,0,100,150_AL_.jpg" srcset="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkzNjEzMDEzMF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDI0MjE4MjE@._V1_SY300_CR1,0,200,300_AL_.jpg 2x, https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkzNjEzMDEzMF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDI0MjE4MjE@._V1_SY450_CR2,0,300,450_AL_.jpg 3x, https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkzNjEzMDEzMF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDI0MjE4MjE@._V1_SY600_CR2,0,400,600_AL_.jpg 4x"/>
           <div class="news-article__content">
            The finale of “
            <a href="/title/tt2442560/">
             Peaky Blinders
            </a>
            ” will be a feature-length episode that builds expectations for an upcoming franchise film, director
            <a href="/name/nm1396104/">
             Anthony Byrne
            </a>
            says.
            <br/>
            <br/>
            Byrne told RadioTimes.com the Season 6 send-off has a run time of 81 minutes.
            <br/>
            <br/>
            “It’s such a Peaky thing to do for the last hurrah. It’s the 10:22 news for one night only,” Byrne said. “It feels very, very different to the rest of the season. It feels very, very different to anything we’ve done before. It’s very epic in scope. It feels like a film – it’s a kind of dry run for the feature film.”
            <br/>
            <br/>
            Show creator
            <a href="/name/nm1140275/">
             Steven Knight
            </a>
            also told RadioTimes.com that the upcoming movie will be an “untold story that happened in the Second World War, which the Peakys are going to be involved in”.
            <br/>
            <br/>
            Byrne has previously responded to criticism about the change in the show’s tone, especially for the last season.
           </div>
           <a class="tracked-offsite-link" data-page-action="offsite-thewrap" data-page-const="" data-page-type="" data-ref="nwc_art_sm" data-subpage-type="" href="https://www.thewrap.com/peaky-blinders-finale-movie-length-dry-run/" onclick="window.imdb.trackOffsiteLink(this)" rel="" target="_blank">
            See full article at The Wrap
           </a>
           »
          </section>

         <article class="ipl-zebra-list__item news-article">
          <header class="news-article__header">
           <h2 class="news-article__title">
            <a class="tracked-offsite-link" data-page-action="offsite-variety" data-page-const="" data-page-type="" data-ref="nwc_art_hd" data-subpage-type="" href="https://variety.com/2022/tv/news/gabrielle-union-truth-be-told-apple-1235212788/" onclick="window.imdb.trackOffsiteLink(this)" rel="" target="_blank">
             Gabrielle Union Cast in ‘Truth Be Told’ Season 3 Opposite Octavia Spencer
            </a>
           </h2>
           <ul class="news-article__header-detail ipl-inline-list">
            <li class="ipl-inline-list__item news-article__date">
             23 March 2022
            </li>
            <li class="ipl-inline-list__item news-article__author">
             by Selome Hailu
            </li>
            <li class="ipl-inline-list__item news-article__source">
             <a class="tracked-offsite-link" data-page-action="offsite-variety" data-page-const="" data-page-type="" data-ref="nwc_art_src" data-subpage-type="" href="https://variety.com/2022/tv/news/gabrielle-union-truth-be-told-apple-1235212788/" onclick="window.imdb.trackOffsiteLink(this)" rel="" target="_blank">
              Variety - TV News
             </a>
            </li>
           </ul>
          </header>
          <section class="news-article__body">
           <img alt="Gabrielle Union Cast in ‘Truth Be Told’ Season 3 Opposite Octavia Spencer" class="news-article__image" src="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjZmNzQzYWYtMGFhYi00Y2MxLThhNDEtNWY4ZmM1MzBhMWI2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTE0MzQwMjgz._V1_SY150_CR83,0,100,150_AL_.jpg" srcset="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjZmNzQzYWYtMGFhYi00Y2MxLThhNDEtNWY4ZmM1MzBhMWI2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTE0MzQwMjgz._V1_SY300_CR166,0,200,300_AL_.jpg 2x, https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjZmNzQzYWYtMGFhYi00Y2MxLThhNDEtNWY4ZmM1MzBhMWI2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTE0MzQwMjgz._V1_SY450_CR249,0,300,450_AL_.jpg 3x"/>
           <div class="news-article__content">
            Apple TV Plus announced that
            <a href="/name/nm0005517/">
             Gabrielle Union
            </a>
            will star in Season 3 of the
            <a href="/name/nm0818055/">
             Octavia Spencer
            </a>
            -led anthology drama series “
            <a href="/title/tt7821582/">
             Truth Be Told
            </a>
            .” Union plays Eva, an outspoken high school principal.
            <br/>
            <br/>
            “
            <a href="/title/tt7821582/">
             Truth Be Told
            </a>
            ” follows Spencer as Poppy Scoville, a true crime podcaster who risks everything — including her life — to pursue the truth. Season 3 sees Poppy focus on Eva’s case as she becomes embroiled in a problematic incident. The series is based on
            <a href="/name/nm9526978/">
             Kathleen Barber
            </a>
            ’s 2017 novel “
            <a href="/title/tt7821582/">
             Are You Sleeping
            </a>
            ,” and highlights the American obsession with true crime as well as the consequences that come with seeking justice on a public stage.
           </div>

         <article class="ipl-zebra-list__item news-article">
          <header class="news-article__header">
           <h2 class="news-article__title">
            <a class="tracked-offsite-link" data-page-action="offsite-thewrap" data-page-const="" data-page-type="" data-ref="nwc_art_hd" data-subpage-type="" href="https://www.thewrap.com/misha-collins-supernatural-gotham-knights-harvey-dent/" onclick="window.imdb.trackOffsiteLink(this)" rel="" target="_blank">
             ‘Supernatural’ Alum Misha Collins to Play Harvey Dent in the CW’s ‘Gotham Knights’
            </a>
           </h2>
           <ul class="news-article__header-detail ipl-inline-list">
            <li class="ipl-inline-list__item news-article__date">
             23 March 2022
            </li>
            <li class="ipl-inline-list__item news-article__author">
             by Katie Campione
            </li>
            <li class="ipl-inline-list__item news-article__source">
             <a class="tracked-offsite-link" data-page-action="offsite-thewrap" data-page-const="" data-page-type="" data-ref="nwc_art_src" data-subpage-type="" href="https://www.thewrap.com/misha-collins-supernatural-gotham-knights-harvey-dent/" onclick="window.imdb.trackOffsiteLink(this)" rel="" target="_blank">
              The Wrap
             </a>
            </li>
           </ul>
          </header>
          <section class="news-article__body">
           <img alt="‘Supernatural’ Alum Misha Collins to Play Harvey Dent in the CW’s ‘Gotham Knights’" class="news-article__image" src="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTNhNjQ4MGEtMWYzMi00ZTRiLWJhMTYtZTFiN2ExNmEyMTQ0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjI5MTQxNzQ@._V1_SY150_CR0,0,100,150_AL_.jpg" srcset="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTNhNjQ4MGEtMWYzMi00ZTRiLWJhMTYtZTFiN2ExNmEyMTQ0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjI5MTQxNzQ@._V1_SY300_CR0,0,200,300_AL_.jpg 2x, https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTNhNjQ4MGEtMWYzMi00ZTRiLWJhMTYtZTFiN2ExNmEyMTQ0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjI5MTQxNzQ@._V1_SY450_CR0,0,300,450_AL_.jpg 3x, https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTNhNjQ4MGEtMWYzMi00ZTRiLWJhMTYtZTFiN2ExNmEyMTQ0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjI5MTQxNzQ@._V1_SY600_CR0,0,400,600_AL_.jpg 4x"/>
           <div class="news-article__content">
            <a href="/name/nm0172557/">
             Misha Collins
            </a>
            is returning to The CW. The “Supernatural” alum is joining the cast of “
            <a href="/title/tt16418896/">
             Gotham Knights
            </a>
            ,” which is currently in the pilot phase.
            <br/>
            <br/>
            The drama series revolves around Bruce Wayne’s son, who teams up with the children of famous Batman villains in the wake of the Dark Knight’s murder.
            <br/>
            <br/>
            Collins will play the famed role of
            <a href="/name/nm1758364/">
             Harvey Dent
            </a>
            ,
            <a href="/title/tt1345836/">
             Gotham
            </a>
            ’s charismatic, hard-charging District Attorney who will eventually become one of the city’s most feared supervillains, Two-Face.
            <br/>
            <br/>
            “
            <a href="/title/tt16418896/">
             Gotham Knights
            </a>
            ” is not based on the upcoming video game from
            <a href="/company/co0026840/">
             Warner Bros.
            </a>
            of the same name, but rather the characters from the comics.
            <br/>
            <br/>
            “
            <a href="/title/tt16418896/">
             Gotham Knights
            </a>
            ” will be written and executive produced by
            <a href="/name/nm1241294/">
             Chad Fiveash
            </a>
            and James Stoteraux, with
            <a href="/name/nm0009219/">
             Natalie Abrams
            </a>
            as a writer and co-executive producer.
            <a href="/name/nm0075528/">
             Greg Berlanti
            </a>
            ,
            <a href="/name/nm1150863/">
             Sarah Schechter
            </a>
            and David Madden will executive produce for
            <a href="/company/co0330789/">
             Berlanti Productions
            </a>
            in association with
            <a href="/company/co0005035/">
             Warner Bros. Television
            </a>
            .
            <br/>
            <br/>
            Collins previously starred on
           </div>
           <a class="tracked-offsite-link" data-page-action="offsite-thewrap" data-page-const="" data-page-type="" data-ref="nwc_art_sm" data-subpage-type="" href="https://www.thewrap.com/misha-collins-supernatural-gotham-knights-harvey-dent/" onclick="window.imdb.trackOffsiteLink(this)" rel="" target="_blank">
            See full article at The Wrap
           </a>
           »
          </section>

         <article class="ipl-zebra-list__item news-article">
          <header class="news-article__header">
           <h2 class="news-article__title">
            <a class="tracked-offsite-link" data-page-action="offsite-thewrap" data-page-const="" data-page-type="" data-ref="nwc_art_hd" data-subpage-type="" href="https://www.thewrap.com/the-suicide-squad-daniela-melchior-fast-and-furious-10/" onclick="window.imdb.trackOffsiteLink(this)" rel="" target="_blank">
             ‘The Suicide Squad’ Breakout Daniela Melchior in Talks to Join ‘Fast and Furious 10’ (Exclusive)
            </a>
           </h2>
           <ul class="news-article__header-detail ipl-inline-list">
            <li class="ipl-inline-list__item news-article__date">
             21 March 2022
            </li>
            <li class="ipl-inline-list__item news-article__author">
             by Umberto Gonzalez
            </li>
            <li class="ipl-inline-list__item news-article__source">
             <a class="tracked-offsite-link" data-page-action="offsite-thewrap" data-page-const="" data-page-type="" data-ref="nwc_art_src" data-subpage-type="" href="https://www.thewrap.com/the-suicide-squad-daniela-melchior-fast-and-furious-10/" onclick="window.imdb.trackOffsiteLink(this)" rel="" target="_blank">
              The Wrap
             </a>
            </li>
           </ul>
          </header>
          <section class="news-article__body">
           <img alt="‘The Suicide Squad’ Breakout Daniela Melchior in Talks to Join ‘Fast and Furious 10’ (Exclusive)" class="news-article__image" src="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWIzZTYwOTAtN2UxNy00OTgzLWE5OTAtYzhjMTk4YTlhMzk5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTAyNDczMTA5._V1_SY150_CR7,0,100,150_AL_.jpg" srcset="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWIzZTYwOTAtN2UxNy00OTgzLWE5OTAtYzhjMTk4YTlhMzk5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTAyNDczMTA5._V1_SY300_CR15,0,200,300_AL_.jpg 2x, https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWIzZTYwOTAtN2UxNy00OTgzLWE5OTAtYzhjMTk4YTlhMzk5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTAyNDczMTA5._V1_SY450_CR23,0,300,450_AL_.jpg 3x, https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWIzZTYwOTAtN2UxNy00OTgzLWE5OTAtYzhjMTk4YTlhMzk5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTAyNDczMTA5._V1_SY600_CR31,0,400,600_AL_.jpg 4x"/>
           <div class="news-article__content">
            Portuguese actress
            <a href="/name/nm6403016/">
             Daniela Melchior
            </a>
            , who broke out playing Ratcatcher 2 in
            <a href="/name/nm0348181/">
             James Gunn
            </a>
            ’s “
            <a href="/title/tt6334354/">
             The Suicide Squad
            </a>
            ,” is in talks to join the cast of the 10th “
            <a href="/title/tt0232500/">
             Fast and Furious
            </a>
            ” movie alongside
            <a href="/name/nm0004874/">
             Vin Diesel
            </a>
            ,
            <a href="/company/co0569744/">
             TheWrap
            </a>
            has exclusively learned.
            <br/>
            <br/>
            Plot details for “Fast 10” are still being kept under wraps, as are any character details. Melchior joins new cast member
            <a href="/name/nm0597388/">
             Jason Momoa
            </a>
            who could reportedly star as one of the film’s villains in the action franchise.
            <br/>
            <br/>
            Diesel is set to return to the franchise along with
            <a href="/name/nm0735442/">
             Michelle Rodriguez
            </a>
            ,
            <a href="/name/nm0879085/">
             Tyrese Gibson
            </a>
            ,
            <a href="/name/nm0524839/">
             Ludacris
            </a>
            and
            <a href="/name/nm0437646/">
             Sung Kang
            </a>
            , as is director
            <a href="/name/nm0510912/">
             Justin Lin
            </a>
            . Diesel and Lin are also producing “Fast and Furious 10,” which is still untitled.
            <br/>
            <br/>
            <a href="/company/co0784875/">
             Universal
            </a>
            has “Fast and Furious 10” slated for release on May 19, 2023.
            <br/>
            <br/>
            Along with “
            <a href="/title/tt6334354/">
             The Suicide Squad
            </a>
            ,” Melchior also did the Portuguese dubbing voice for
            <a href="/name/nm9086797/">
             Gwen Stacy
            </a>
            in “
            <a href="/title/tt4633694/">
             Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
            </a>
            ,” which was originally voiced by
            <a href="/name/nm2794962/">
             Hailee Steinfeld
            </a>
            . Melchior will next
           </div>
           <a class="tracked-offsite-link" data-page-action="offsite-thewrap" data-page-const="" data-page-type="" data-ref="nwc_art_sm" data-subpage-type="" href="https://www.thewrap.com/the-suicide-squad-daniela-melchior-fast-and-furious-10/" onclick="window.imdb.trackOffsiteLink(this)" rel="" target="_blank">
            See full article at The Wrap
           </a>
           »
          </section>

         <article class="ipl-zebra-list__item news-article">
          <header class="news-article__header">
           <h2 class="news-article__title">
            <a class="tracked-offsite-link" data-page-action="offsite-thewrap" data-page-const="" data-page-type="" data-ref="nwc_art_hd" data-subpage-type="" href="https://www.thewrap.com/amanda-bynes-9-year-conservatorship-no-longer-needed-judge-says/" onclick="window.imdb.trackOffsiteLink(this)" rel="" target="_blank">
             Amanda Bynes’ 9-Year Conservatorship ‘No Longer Needed,’ Judge Says
            </a>
           </h2>
           <ul class="news-article__header-detail ipl-inline-list">
            <li class="ipl-inline-list__item news-article__date">
             22 March 2022
            </li>
            <li class="ipl-inline-list__item news-article__author">
             by Sharon Knolle
            </li>
            <li class="ipl-inline-list__item news-article__source">
             <a class="tracked-offsite-link" data-page-action="offsite-thewrap" data-page-const="" data-page-type="" data-ref="nwc_art_src" data-subpage-type="" href="https://www.thewrap.com/amanda-bynes-9-year-conservatorship-no-longer-needed-judge-says/" onclick="window.imdb.trackOffsiteLink(this)" rel="" target="_blank">
              The Wrap
             </a>
            </li>
           </ul>
          </header>
          <section class="news-article__body">
           <img alt="Amanda Bynes’ 9-Year Conservatorship ‘No Longer Needed,’ Judge Says" class="news-article__image" src="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjc0OTY0NDk5MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTM1ODY3Mg@@._V1_SX100_CR0,0,100,150_AL_.jpg" srcset="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjc0OTY0NDk5MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTM1ODY3Mg@@._V1_SX200_CR0,0,200,300_AL_.jpg 2x"/>
           <div class="news-article__content">
            A judge is expected to terminate Amanda Bynes’ conservatorship of nearly nine years after tentatively ruling on Monday that the former child star, now 35, no longer needs someone else to manage her personal and business affairs.
            <br/>
            <br/>
            “The court determines that the conservatorship is no longer required and that grounds for establishment of a conservatorship of the person no longer exist,” Judge Roger L. Lund of Ventura County Superior Court wrote Monday in the tentative ruling, obtained by
            <a href="/company/co0569744/">
             TheWrap
            </a>
            .
            <br/>
            <br/>
            Bynes filed last month to end the conservatorship, which was put in place after exhibiting erratic behavior in 2013 such as setting a driveway on fire. Her mother Lynn has been her conservator since October 2014 and is fully in support of ending the arrangement, according to
            <a href="/name/nm12644218/">
             Tamar Arminak
            </a>
            , an attorney for her parents.
            <br/>
            <br/>
            Bynes’ representatives didn’t immediately respond to a request for comment from TheWrap.
            <br/>
            <br/>
            Arminak told
            <a href="/company/co0095173/">
             NBC News
            </a>
            in February that
           </div>
           <a class="tracked-offsite-link" data-page-action="offsite-thewrap" data-page-const="" data-page-type="" data-ref="nwc_art_sm" data-subpage-type="" href="https://www.thewrap.com/amanda-bynes-9-year-conservatorship-no-longer-needed-judge-says/" onclick="window.imdb.trackOffsiteLink(this)" rel="" target="_blank">
            See full article at The Wrap
           </a>
           »
          </section>

         <article class="ipl-zebra-list__item news-article">
          <header class="news-article__header">
           <h2 class="news-article__title">
            <a class="tracked-offsite-link" data-page-action="offsite-variety" data-page-const="" data-page-type="" data-ref="nwc_art_hd" data-subpage-type="" href="https://variety.com/2022/film/news/new-zealand-film-festival-reduced-size-1235213283/" onclick="window.imdb.trackOffsiteLink(this)" rel="" target="_blank">
             New Zealand Film Festival Plans Reduced-Size In-Person Edition
            </a>
           </h2>
           <ul class="news-article__header-detail ipl-inline-list">
            <li class="ipl-inline-list__item news-article__date">
             24 March 2022
            </li>
            <li class="ipl-inline-list__item news-article__author">
             by Patrick Frater
            </li>
            <li class="ipl-inline-list__item news-article__source">
             <a class="tracked-offsite-link" data-page-action="offsite-variety" data-page-const="" data-page-type="" data-ref="nwc_art_src" data-subpage-type="" href="https://variety.com/2022/film/news/new-zealand-film-festival-reduced-size-1235213283/" onclick="window.imdb.trackOffsiteLink(this)" rel="" target="_blank">
              Variety - Film News
             </a>
            </li>
           </ul>
          </header>
          <section class="news-article__body">
           <img alt="New Zealand Film Festival Plans Reduced-Size In-Person Edition" class="news-article__image" src="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGUxNWI0NDMtYWI1Ni00NGFmLWFkM2UtNTMzMGQ4OWEwODM5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTE0MzQwMjgz._V1_SY150_CR83,0,100,150_AL_.jpg" srcset="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGUxNWI0NDMtYWI1Ni00NGFmLWFkM2UtNTMzMGQ4OWEwODM5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTE0MzQwMjgz._V1_SY300_CR166,0,200,300_AL_.jpg 2x, https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGUxNWI0NDMtYWI1Ni00NGFmLWFkM2UtNTMzMGQ4OWEwODM5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTE0MzQwMjgz._V1_SY450_CR249,0,300,450_AL_.jpg 3x"/>
           <div class="news-article__content">
            The New Zealand International Film Festival will return to an in-person event this year, but in a scaled-down format. It will operate in multiple cities between July 28 and Sept. 4, 2022.
            <br/>
            <br/>
            Management explained the downsizing as both a reaction to the impact of Covid-19 and as a means to bouncing back bigger in 2023.
            <br/>
            <br/>
            It operated as a hybrid festival in 2020 and then in 2021 in cinemas in 11 towns and cities. But it was forced to cancel screenings in Auckland and Hamilton due to the last year’s lockdowns. Capacity reductions in other venues “had a significant impact on our gross revenue.”
            <br/>
            <br/>
            The 2022 festival will visit Auckland, Hamilton, Tauranga, Hawke’s Bay, New Plymouth, Palmerston North, Masterton, Wellington, Nelson, Christchurch, Timaru, Dunedin and Gore.
            <br/>
            <br/>
            The temporary format means fewer films, fewer venues (particularly in Auckland and Wellington), a shorter duration in each city, a smaller team delivering the festival and reduced above-the-line marketing activity.
           </div>
           <a class="tracked-offsite-link" data-page-action="offsite-variety" data-page-const="" data-page-type="" data-ref="nwc_art_sm" data-subpage-type="" href="https://variety.com/2022/film/news/new-zealand-film-festival-reduced-size-1235213283/" onclick="window.imdb.trackOffsiteLink(this)" rel="" target="_blank">
            See full article at Variety - Film News
           </a>
           »
          </section>

         <article class="ipl-zebra-list__item news-article">
          <header class="news-article__header">
           <h2 class="news-article__title">
            <a class="tracked-offsite-link" data-page-action="offsite-variety" data-page-const="" data-page-type="" data-ref="nwc_art_hd" data-subpage-type="" href="https://variety.com/2022/tv/global/bbc-funding-ukraine-1235213278/" onclick="window.imdb.trackOffsiteLink(this)" rel="" target="_blank">
             BBC Receives Additional U.K. Government Funding to Counter Ukraine War Disinformation
            </a>
           </h2>
           <ul class="news-article__header-detail ipl-inline-list">
            <li class="ipl-inline-list__item news-article__date">
             24 March 2022
            </li>
            <li class="ipl-inline-list__item news-article__author">
             by Naman Ramachandran
            </li>
            <li class="ipl-inline-list__item news-article__source">
             <a class="tracked-offsite-link" data-page-action="offsite-variety" data-page-const="" data-page-type="" data-ref="nwc_art_src" data-subpage-type="" href="https://variety.com/2022/tv/global/bbc-funding-ukraine-1235213278/" onclick="window.imdb.trackOffsiteLink(this)" rel="" target="_blank">
              Variety - TV News
             </a>
            </li>
           </ul>
          </header>
          <section class="news-article__body">
           <img alt="BBC Receives Additional U.K. Government Funding to Counter Ukraine War Disinformation" class="news-article__image" src="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzRjMGU0YmItNjA3ZC00YzI5LThkMGQtZTJlOGNhMWI4OGQzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTE0MzQwMjgz._V1_SY150_CR83,0,100,150_AL_.jpg" srcset="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzRjMGU0YmItNjA3ZC00YzI5LThkMGQtZTJlOGNhMWI4OGQzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTE0MzQwMjgz._V1_SY300_CR166,0,200,300_AL_.jpg 2x, https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzRjMGU0YmItNjA3ZC00YzI5LThkMGQtZTJlOGNhMWI4OGQzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTE0MzQwMjgz._V1_SY450_CR249,0,300,450_AL_.jpg 3x"/>
           <div class="news-article__content">
            The
            <a href="/company/co0377087/">
             BBC World Service
            </a>
            has sought and will receive £4.1 million ($5.4 million) in additional funding to counter disinformation around the ongoing Russian invasion of Ukraine.
            <br/>
            <br/>
            The emergency funding would to help the
            <a href="/company/co0843630/">
             BBC
            </a>
            “continue bringing independent, impartial and accurate news to people in Ukraine and Russia in the face of increased propaganda from the Russian state,” the U.K. government said in a statement.
            <br/>
            <br/>
            On March 4, the BBC temporarily suspended its Russian journalism operations following the introduction of new laws that could see journalists fined, imprisoned or even punished with “forced labor” for reporting on the country’s assault of Ukraine.
           </div>
           <a class="tracked-offsite-link" data-page-action="offsite-variety" data-page-const="" data-page-type="" data-ref="nwc_art_sm" data-subpage-type="" href="https://variety.com/2022/tv/global/bbc-funding-ukraine-1235213278/" onclick="window.imdb.trackOffsiteLink(this)" rel="" target="_blank">
            See full article at Variety - TV News
           </a>
           »
          </section>
          <footer class="news-article__footer">

            <a href="/name/nm3317244/">
             Jana McKinnon
            </a>

            <a href="/name/nm9220161/">

            </a>

            <a href="/name/nm8485169/">

            <a href="/company/co0523322/">

           <img alt="‘Spin Me Round’ Review: You’ll Never See Alfredo Sauce the Same Way Again" class="news-article__image" src="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDQzNDEzZjUtN2MzYy00YmQ5LTgwNzctOGIxZTJjODYyNWI4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTE0MzQwMjgz._V1_SY150_CR83,0,100,150_AL_.jpg" srcset="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDQzNDEzZjUtN2MzYy00YmQ5LTgwNzctOGIxZTJjODYyNWI4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTE0MzQwMjgz._V1_SY300_CR166,0,200,300_AL_.jpg 2x, https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDQzNDEzZjUtN2MzYy00YmQ5LTgwNzctOGIxZTJjODYyNWI4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTE0MzQwMjgz._V1_SY450_CR249,0,300,450_AL_.jpg 3x"/>
           <div class="news-article__content">
            A frothy wish-fulfillment comedy that takes a few wildly unpredictable turns, “
            <a href="/title/tt14596320/">
             Spin Me Round
            </a>
            ” serves up an al dente satire of corporate retreat culture by following the manager of a popular pasta restaurant on an all-expenses-paid trip to Italy, where nothing goes as she expected. Amber (
            <a href="/name/nm1555340/">
             Alison Brie
            </a>
            ) imagines something along the lines of the company’s TV commercials, in which handsome Tuscan Grove founder
            <a href="/name/nm3283448/">
             Nick Martucci
            </a>
            (
            <a href="/name/nm0005273/">
             Alessandro Nivola
            </a>
            ) serves pasta in the shade of the family villa — the ideal backdrop for a straightforward rom-com scenario. But this sly, if slightly undercooked movie has other plans, earning its title as it keeps us guessing.
            <br/>
            <br/>
            Reteaming with “
            <a href="/title/tt11388406/">
             Horse Girl
            </a>
            ” director
            <a href="/name/nm1337885/">
             Jeff Baena
            </a>
            , Brie co-wrote the script, conceiving her own character as a basic, ambitionless
            <a href="/name/nm0000030/">
             Audrey Hepburn
            </a>
            type — all the better to misdirect audiences, who’ve been led to believe they’re in for a low-budget “Roman Holiday,” rather than the more
           </div>
           <a class="tracked-offsite-link" data-page-action="offsite-variety" data-page-const="" data-page-type="" data-ref="nwc_art_sm" data-subpage-type="" href="https://variety.com/2022/film/reviews/spin-me-round-review-alison-brie-1235210961/" onclick="window.imdb.trackOffsiteLink(this)" rel="" target="_blank">
            See full article at Variety - Film News
           </a>
           »
          </section>

         <article class="ipl-zebra-list__item news-article">
          <header class="news-article__header">
           <h2 class="news-article__title">
            <a class="tracked-offsite-link" data-page-action="offsite-variety" data-page-const="" data-page-type="" data-ref="nwc_art_hd" data-subpage-type="" href="https://variety.com/2022/film/reviews/dio-dreamers-never-die-review-ronnie-james-dio-1235212927/" onclick="window.imdb.trackOffsiteLink(this)" rel="" target="_blank">

           </h2>

             24 March 2022
            </li>

            <li class="ipl-inline-list__item news-article__source">

              Variety - Film News
             </a>
            </li>
           </ul>
          </header>
          <section class="news-article__body">
           <img alt="‘Dio: Dreamers Never Die’ Review: Portrait of a Metal Gentleman Who Only Sang Like the Devil" class="news-article__image" src="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGFiZmI0ZWQtZTQ0Ni00NTZhLTkwMDItYWVjMmRlYTkxYzYwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTE0MzQwMjgz._V1_SY150_CR83,0,100,150_AL_.jpg" srcset="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGFiZmI0ZWQtZTQ0Ni00NTZhLTkwMDItYWVjMmRlYTkxYzYwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTE0MzQwMjgz._V1_SY300_CR167,0,200,300_AL_.jpg 2x, https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGFiZmI0ZWQtZTQ0Ni00NTZhLTkwMDItYWVjMmRlYTkxYzYwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTE0MzQwMjgz._V1_SY450_CR250,0,300,450_AL_.jpg 3x"/>
           <div class="news-article__content">
            In music’s metal subculture, the late singer
            <a href="/name/nm0227875/">
             Ronnie James Dio
            </a>
            may still count as the genre’s most widely beloved figure, which makes him ripe for a documentary. He was almost completely uncontroversial, which doesn’t necessarily bode as well for such a treatment. The dude who popularized the so-called “devil horns” hand gesture was no demon. He just played one on
            <a href="/company/co0813116/">
             MTV
            </a>
            , or at least enjoyed dragging out the sinister imagery, even if in in real life he came off as a friendly upstate New York guy who’d made it big with a penchant for vaguely mystic imagery and a mountain-king-sized voice that could fill the biggest halls.
            <br/>
            <br/>
            “Dio: Dreamers Never Die,” the latest in a series of effective, mostly unpretentious rock docs produced by
            <a href="/company/co0217017/">
             BMG
            </a>
            , doesn’t present its subject as a particularly tortured or even complicated guy. It may be the most drugless documentary ever
           </div>

            See full article at Variety - Film News
           </a>
           »

           <div class="news-article__content">
            “

            The Casting Society honors excellence in casting across feature films, television and theater. The organization held a virtual ceremony on Wednesday, also celebrating its 40th anniversary.
            <br/>

           </div>

            </a>
           </h2>
           <ul class="news-article__header-detail ipl-inline-list">
            <li class="ipl-inline-list__item news-article__date">
             24 March 2022
            </li>
            <li class="ipl-inline-list__item news-article__author">
             by Marc Malkin and Chris Willman
            </li>
            <li class="ipl-inline-list__item news-article__source">
             <a class="tracked-offsite-link" data-page-action="offsite-variety" data-page-const="" data-page-type="" data-ref="nwc_art_src" data-subpage-type="" href="https://variety.com/2022/music/news/stephen-sondheim-grammys-ben-platt-cynthia-erivo-leslie-odom-rachel-zegler-1235213093/" onclick="window.imdb.trackOffsiteLink(this)" rel="" target="_blank">

           </ul>
          </header>
          <section class="news-article__body">
           <img alt="Stephen Sondheim to Be Saluted at Grammys by Rachel Zegler, Cynthia Erivo, Ben Platt, Leslie Odom Jr. (Exclusive)" class="news-article__image" src="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDdmOTNmYmMtZGJhNy00NzM4LWE3NjYtODQ4YzAxMzk2ZmM5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTE0MzQwMjgz._V1_SY150_CR83,0,100,150_AL_.jpg" srcset="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDdmOTNmYmMtZGJhNy00NzM4LWE3NjYtODQ4YzAxMzk2ZmM5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTE0MzQwMjgz._V1_SY300_CR166,0,200,300_AL_.jpg 2x, https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDdmOTNmYmMtZGJhNy00NzM4LWE3NjYtODQ4YzAxMzk2ZmM5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTE0MzQwMjgz._V1_SY450_CR250,0,300,450_AL_.jpg 3x, https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDdmOTNmYmMtZGJhNy00NzM4LWE3NjYtODQ4YzAxMzk2ZmM5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTE0MzQwMjgz._V1_SY600_CR333,0,400,600_AL_.jpg 4x"/>
           <div class="news-article__content">
            Send in the tears:
            <a href="/name/nm0814227/">
             Stephen Sondheim
            </a>
            is due to be remembered in song at the upcoming Grammy Awards by
            <a href="/name/nm7248827/">
             Cynthia Erivo
            </a>
            ,
            <a href="/name/nm1502434/">
             Leslie Odom Jr.
            </a>
            ,
            <a href="/name/nm4805317/">
             Ben Platt
            </a>
            and
            <a href="/name/nm10399505/">
             Rachel Zegler
            </a>
            , sources tell Variety.
            <br/>
            <br/>
            The performances, which have not yet been officially announced, are said to be part of the show’s traditional
            <a href="/title/tt5023260/">
             In Memoriam
            </a>
            segment, rather than a separate moment during the telecast.
            <br/>
            <br/>
            Sondheim died on Nov. 26 at age 91. The Grammys are the first of several awards shows that are expected to fete the composing great in some fashion this year, with the Oscars, Tonys and Emmys likely to follow. Sondheim
           </div>

          </header>
          <section class="news-article__body">
           <img alt="Solis Studios, Kodiak Pictures to Co-Finance Defiant Studios Slate" class="news-article__image" src="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDM3NDc4MWEtOGQxZS00YThiLWJkMTgtMDhjNTc1YTM3ZTcyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTE0MzQwMjgz._V1_SY150_CR62,0,100,150_AL_.jpg" srcset="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDM3NDc4MWEtOGQxZS00YThiLWJkMTgtMDhjNTc1YTM3ZTcyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTE0MzQwMjgz._V1_SY300_CR125,0,200,300_AL_.jpg 2x, https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDM3NDc4MWEtOGQxZS00YThiLWJkMTgtMDhjNTc1YTM3ZTcyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTE0MzQwMjgz._V1_SY450_CR187,0,300,450_AL_.jpg 3x, https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDM3NDc4MWEtOGQxZS00YThiLWJkMTgtMDhjNTc1YTM3ZTcyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTE0MzQwMjgz._V1_SY600_CR250,0,400,600_AL_.jpg 4x"/>
           <div class="news-article__content">
            <a href="/name/nm4251668/">
             Eric B. Fleischman
            </a>
            ’s
            <a href="/company/co0651249/">
             Defiant Studios
            </a>
            has landed film slate financing from Solis Studios and
            <a href="/name/nm5914031/">
             Maurice Fadida
            </a>
            ’s
            <a href="/company/co0633469/">
             Kodiak Pictures
            </a>
            , Variety has learned.
            <br/>
            <br/>
            <a href="/company/co0886130/">
             Defiant
            </a>
            , behind genre titles like “
            <a href="/title/tt11833284/">
             The Knocking
            </a>
            ” (pictured above during production) and “
            <a href="/title/tt11454320/">
             Offseason
            </a>
            ,” will make multiple features under the partnership, with the first to shoot this summer.
            <br/>
            <br/>
            This is the first significant move by Solis, the film division of the media and tech collective led by former “
            <a href="/title/tt0368530/">
             One Tree Hill
            </a>
            ” star
            <a href="/name/nm1505775/">
             Brett Claywell
            </a>
            and Brendan de Kauwe. The company’s goal is to create “deeper layers of engagement between content and the communities who consume it,” their mission statement says, including the utilization of blockchain technology. Solis also counts Polygon Studios as a technology partner.
            <br/>
            <br/>
            “Over the past year we have truly aligned with this team and have become fans of their work, so we couldn’t be more thrilled to launch Solis Studios with this slate of films,
           </div>
           <a class="tracked-offsite-link" data-page-action="offsite-variety" data-page-const="" data-page-type="" data-ref="nwc_art_sm" data-subpage-type="" href="https://variety.com/2022/film/news/defiant-studios-co-financinig-kodiak-solis-1235213091/" onclick="window.imdb.trackOffsiteLink(this)" rel="" target="_blank">
            See full article at Variety - Film News
           </a>
           »

           <h2 class="news-article__title">
            <a class="tracked-offsite-link" data-page-action="offsite-variety" data-page-const="" data-page-type="" data-ref="nwc_art_hd" data-subpage-type="" href="https://variety.com/2022/tv/news/the-masked-singer-season-7-episode-3-recap-cyclops-thingamabob-1235213044/" onclick="window.imdb.trackOffsiteLink(this)" rel="" target="_blank">

            </a>
           </h2>
           <ul class="news-article__header-detail ipl-inline-list">
            <li class="ipl-inline-list__item news-article__date">
             24 March 2022
            </li>
            <li class="ipl-inline-list__item news-article__author">
             by Michael Schneider
            </li>
            <li class="ipl-inline-list__item news-article__source">
             <a class="tracked-offsite-link" data-page-action="offsite-variety" data-page-const="" data-page-type="" data-ref="nwc_art_src" data-subpage-type="" href="https://variety.com/2022/tv/news/the-masked-singer-season-7-episode-3-recap-cyclops-thingamabob-1235213044/" onclick="window.imdb.trackOffsiteLink(this)" rel="" target="_blank">

            </li>
           </ul>
          </header>
          <section class="news-article__body">
           <img alt="‘The Masked Singer’ Reveals Identities of Cyclops and Thingamabob: Here Are the Stars Under the Masks" class="news-article__image" src="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzk4MzkzNmUtZmIzMS00MTlhLWJlMzAtOWUxYWI1N2UzYzIxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTE0MzQwMjgz._V1_SY150_CR79,0,100,150_AL_.jpg" srcset="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzk4MzkzNmUtZmIzMS00MTlhLWJlMzAtOWUxYWI1N2UzYzIxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTE0MzQwMjgz._V1_SY300_CR158,0,200,300_AL_.jpg 2x, https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzk4MzkzNmUtZmIzMS00MTlhLWJlMzAtOWUxYWI1N2UzYzIxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTE0MzQwMjgz._V1_SY450_CR238,0,300,450_AL_.jpg 3x, https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzk4MzkzNmUtZmIzMS00MTlhLWJlMzAtOWUxYWI1N2UzYzIxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTE0MzQwMjgz._V1_SY600_CR317,0,400,600_AL_.jpg 4x"/>
           <div class="news-article__content">
            Spoiler Alert: Do not read ahead if you have not watched Season 7, Episode 3, of “
            <a href="/title/tt7670568/">
             The Masked Singer
            </a>
            ,” “The Double Unmasking — Round 1 Finals,” which aired March 23 on Fox.
            <br/>
            <br/>
            Nope, the unmasking we’re all dreading still didn’t happen in Week 3 of “
            <a href="/title/tt7670568/">
             The Masked Singer
            </a>
            ,” as two more celebrities exited the show in a double elimination. Exiting this week were “
            <a href="/title/tt0411008/">
             Lost
            </a>
            ” and “Hawaii Five-0” star
            <a href="/name/nm0306201/">
             Jorge Garcia
            </a>
            , who had performed as the
            <a href="/company/co0026736/">
             Cyclops
            </a>
            , and Philadelphia Eagles offensive tackle
            <a href="/name/nm12337021/">
             Jordan Mailata
            </a>
            , revealed as the Thingamabob.
            <br/>
            <br/>
            Garcia, as Cyclops (from “Team Bad”), ended his run after a stirring rendition of “Flashdance (What a Feeling),” by
            <a href="/name/nm0001011/">
             Irene Cara
            </a>
            ,
           </div>

           »

           </h2>
           <ul class="news-article__header-detail ipl-inline-list">
            <li class="ipl-inline-list__item news-article__date">
             24 March 2022
            </li>
            <li class="ipl-inline-list__item news-article__author">
             by Katie Campione
            </li>
            <li class="ipl-inline-list__item news-article__source">
             <a class="tracked-offsite-link" data-page-action="offsite-thewrap" data-page-const="" data-page-type="" data-ref="nwc_art_src" data-subpage-type="" href="https://www.thewrap.com/masked-singer-cyclops-thingamabob-revealed/" onclick="window.imdb.trackOffsiteLink(this)" rel="" target="_blank">

            </li>
           </ul>
          </header>
          <section class="news-article__body">
           <img alt="‘Masked Singer': How Thingamabob and Cyclops Outfoxed the Judges" class="news-article__image" src="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjBjODIzOTEtOWYyNi00NzAwLTk0YzMtODJjYzgwNGNlZGZiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODk4Nzg5NjE@._V1_SY150_CR10,0,100,150_AL_.jpg" srcset="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjBjODIzOTEtOWYyNi00NzAwLTk0YzMtODJjYzgwNGNlZGZiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODk4Nzg5NjE@._V1_SY300_CR20,0,200,300_AL_.jpg 2x, https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjBjODIzOTEtOWYyNi00NzAwLTk0YzMtODJjYzgwNGNlZGZiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODk4Nzg5NjE@._V1_SY450_CR30,0,300,450_AL_.jpg 3x, https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjBjODIzOTEtOWYyNi00NzAwLTk0YzMtODJjYzgwNGNlZGZiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODk4Nzg5NjE@._V1_SY600_CR40,0,400,600_AL_.jpg 4x"/>
           <div class="news-article__content">
            (Warning: This post contains spoilers for Wednesday’s “
            <a href="/title/tt7670568/">
             The Masked Singer
            </a>
            .”)
            <br/>
            <br/>
            Wednesday night marked the first double unmasking of the season for “
            <a href="/title/tt7670568/">
             The Masked Singer
            </a>
            .” Both Thingamabob and Cyclops were eliminated from the competition, meaning that Firefly came out on top for Round 1.
            <br/>
            <br/>
            While Thingamabob and Cyclops were sad to say goodbye to the competition, both told
            <a href="/company/co0569744/">
             TheWrap
            </a>
            they were extremely satisfied that they were able to stump the judges.
            <br/>
            <br/>
            Judges
            <a href="/name/nm1479027/">
             Robin Thicke
            </a>
            and
            <a href="/name/nm0421822/">
             Ken Jeong
            </a>
            both had superheroes on their minds for Thingamabob. Thicke insisted that all clues pointed to “Aquaman” star
            <a href="/name/nm0597388/">
             Jason Momoa
            </a>
            , while Jeong was convinced that the God of Thunder
            <a href="/name/nm1165110/">
             Chris Hemsworth
            </a>
            was behind the mask. But, his true identity was none other than Philadelphia Eagles offensive tackle
            <a href="/name/nm12337021/">
             Jordan Mailata
            </a>
            .
            <br/>
            <br/>
            “When they guessed that I was like, ‘Ok. I do envision myself as Aquaman and Thor, ‘ ” Mailata joked before admitting that he could see how some
           </div>

           »

          </header>
          <section class="news-article__body">
           <img alt="‘Peaky Blinders’ to Air Feature-Length Finale as ‘Dry Run’ for Film Spinoff" class="news-article__image" src="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkzNjEzMDEzMF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDI0MjE4MjE@._V1_SY150_CR0,0,100,150_AL_.jpg" srcset="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkzNjEzMDEzMF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDI0MjE4MjE@._V1_SY300_CR1,0,200,300_AL_.jpg 2x, https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkzNjEzMDEzMF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDI0MjE4MjE@._V1_SY450_CR2,0,300,450_AL_.jpg 3x, https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkzNjEzMDEzMF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDI0MjE4MjE@._V1_SY600_CR2,0,400,600_AL_.jpg 4x"/>
           <div class="news-article__content">
            The finale of “
            <a href="/title/tt2442560/">
             Peaky Blinders
            </a>
            ” will be a feature-length episode that builds expectations for an upcoming franchise film, director
            <a href="/name/nm1396104/">
             Anthony Byrne
            </a>
            says.
            <br/>
            <br/>
            Byrne told RadioTimes.com the Season 6 send-off has a run time of 81 minutes.
            <br/>
            <br/>
            “It’s such a Peaky thing to do for the last hurrah. It’s the 10:22 news for one night only,” Byrne said. “It feels very, very different to the rest of the season. It feels very, very different to anything we’ve done before. It’s very epic in scope. It feels like a film – it’s a kind of dry run for the feature film.”
            <br/>
            <br/>
            Show creator
            <a href="/name/nm1140275/">
             Steven Knight
            </a>
            also told RadioTimes.com that the upcoming movie will be an “untold story that happened in the Second World War, which the Peakys are going to be involved in”.
            <br/>
            <br/>
            Byrne has previously responded to criticism about the change in the show’s tone, especially for the last season.
           </div>
           <a class="tracked-offsite-link" data-page-action="offsite-thewrap" data-page-const="" data-page-type="" data-ref="nwc_art_sm" data-subpage-type="" href="https://www.thewrap.com/peaky-blinders-finale-movie-length-dry-run/" onclick="window.imdb.trackOffsiteLink(this)" rel="" target="_blank">
            See full article at The Wrap
           </a>
           »
          </section>

         <article class="ipl-zebra-list__item news-article">
          <header class="news-article__header">
           <h2 class="news-article__title">
            <a class="tracked-offsite-link" data-page-action="offsite-variety" data-page-const="" data-page-type="" data-ref="nwc_art_hd" data-subpage-type="" href="https://variety.com/2022/tv/news/gabrielle-union-truth-be-told-apple-1235212788/" onclick="window.imdb.trackOffsiteLink(this)" rel="" target="_blank">
             Gabrielle Union Cast in ‘Truth Be Told’ Season 3 Opposite Octavia Spencer
            </a>
           </h2>
           <ul class="news-article__header-detail ipl-inline-list">
            <li class="ipl-inline-list__item news-article__date">
             23 March 2022
            </li>
            <li class="ipl-inline-list__item news-article__author">
             by Selome Hailu
            </li>
            <li class="ipl-inline-list__item news-article__source">
             <a class="tracked-offsite-link" data-page-action="offsite-variety" data-page-const="" data-page-type="" data-ref="nwc_art_src" data-subpage-type="" href="https://variety.com/2022/tv/news/gabrielle-union-truth-be-told-apple-1235212788/" onclick="window.imdb.trackOffsiteLink(this)" rel="" target="_blank">
              Variety - TV News
             </a>
            </li>
           </ul>
          </header>
          <section class="news-article__body">
           <img alt="Gabrielle Union Cast in ‘Truth Be Told’ Season 3 Opposite Octavia Spencer" class="news-article__image" src="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjZmNzQzYWYtMGFhYi00Y2MxLThhNDEtNWY4ZmM1MzBhMWI2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTE0MzQwMjgz._V1_SY150_CR83,0,100,150_AL_.jpg" srcset="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjZmNzQzYWYtMGFhYi00Y2MxLThhNDEtNWY4ZmM1MzBhMWI2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTE0MzQwMjgz._V1_SY300_CR166,0,200,300_AL_.jpg 2x, https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjZmNzQzYWYtMGFhYi00Y2MxLThhNDEtNWY4ZmM1MzBhMWI2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTE0MzQwMjgz._V1_SY450_CR249,0,300,450_AL_.jpg 3x"/>
           <div class="news-article__content">
            Apple TV Plus announced that
            <a href="/name/nm0005517/">
             Gabrielle Union
            </a>
            will star in Season 3 of the
            <a href="/name/nm0818055/">
             Octavia Spencer
            </a>
            -led anthology drama series “
            <a href="/title/tt7821582/">
             Truth Be Told
            </a>
            .” Union plays Eva, an outspoken high school principal.
            <br/>
            <br/>
            “
            <a href="/title/tt7821582/">
             Truth Be Told
            </a>
            ” follows Spencer as Poppy Scoville, a true crime podcaster who risks everything — including her life — to pursue the truth. Season 3 sees Poppy focus on Eva’s case as she becomes embroiled in a problematic incident. The series is based on
            <a href="/name/nm9526978/">
             Kathleen Barber
            </a>
            ’s 2017 novel “
            <a href="/title/tt7821582/">
             Are You Sleeping
            </a>
            ,” and highlights the American obsession with true crime as well as the consequences that come with seeking justice on a public stage.
           </div>
           <a class="tracked-offsite-link" data-page-action="offsite-variety" data-page-const="" data-page-type="" data-ref="nwc_art_sm" data-subpage-type="" href="https://variety.com/2022/tv/news/gabrielle-union-truth-be-told-apple-1235212788/" onclick="window.imdb.trackOffsiteLink(this)" rel="" target="_blank">
            See full article at Variety - TV News
           </a>
           »
          </section>

         <article class="ipl-zebra-list__item news-article">
          <header class="news-article__header">
           <h2 class="news-article__title">
            <a class="tracked-offsite-link" data-page-action="offsite-thewrap" data-page-const="" data-page-type="" data-ref="nwc_art_hd" data-subpage-type="" href="https://www.thewrap.com/misha-collins-supernatural-gotham-knights-harvey-dent/" onclick="window.imdb.trackOffsiteLink(this)" rel="" target="_blank">
             ‘Supernatural’ Alum Misha Collins to Play Harvey Dent in the CW’s ‘Gotham Knights’
            </a>
           </h2>
           <ul class="news-article__header-detail ipl-inline-list">
            <li class="ipl-inline-list__item news-article__date">
             23 March 2022
            </li>
            <li class="ipl-inline-list__item news-article__author">
             by Katie Campione
            </li>
            <li class="ipl-inline-list__item news-article__source">
             <a class="tracked-offsite-link" data-page-action="offsite-thewrap" data-page-const="" data-page-type="" data-ref="nwc_art_src" data-subpage-type="" href="https://www.thewrap.com/misha-collins-supernatural-gotham-knights-harvey-dent/" onclick="window.imdb.trackOffsiteLink(this)" rel="" target="_blank">
              The Wrap
             </a>
            </li>
           </ul>
          </header>
          <section class="news-article__body">
           <img alt="‘Supernatural’ Alum Misha Collins to Play Harvey Dent in the CW’s ‘Gotham Knights’" class="news-article__image" src="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTNhNjQ4MGEtMWYzMi00ZTRiLWJhMTYtZTFiN2ExNmEyMTQ0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjI5MTQxNzQ@._V1_SY150_CR0,0,100,150_AL_.jpg" srcset="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTNhNjQ4MGEtMWYzMi00ZTRiLWJhMTYtZTFiN2ExNmEyMTQ0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjI5MTQxNzQ@._V1_SY300_CR0,0,200,300_AL_.jpg 2x, https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTNhNjQ4MGEtMWYzMi00ZTRiLWJhMTYtZTFiN2ExNmEyMTQ0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjI5MTQxNzQ@._V1_SY450_CR0,0,300,450_AL_.jpg 3x, https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTNhNjQ4MGEtMWYzMi00ZTRiLWJhMTYtZTFiN2ExNmEyMTQ0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjI5MTQxNzQ@._V1_SY600_CR0,0,400,600_AL_.jpg 4x"/>
           <div class="news-article__content">
            <a href="/name/nm0172557/">
             Misha Collins
            </a>
            is returning to The CW. The “Supernatural” alum is joining the cast of “
            <a href="/title/tt16418896/">
             Gotham Knights
            </a>
            ,” which is currently in the pilot phase.
            <br/>
            <br/>
            The drama series revolves around Bruce Wayne’s son, who teams up with the children of famous Batman villains in the wake of the Dark Knight’s murder.
            <br/>
            <br/>
            Collins will play the famed role of
            <a href="/name/nm1758364/">
             Harvey Dent
            </a>
            ,
            <a href="/title/tt1345836/">
             Gotham
            </a>
            ’s charismatic, hard-charging District Attorney who will eventually become one of the city’s most feared supervillains, Two-Face.
            <br/>
            <br/>
            “
            <a href="/title/tt16418896/">
             Gotham Knights
            </a>
            ” is not based on the upcoming video game from
            <a href="/company/co0026840/">
             Warner Bros.
            </a>
            of the same name, but rather the characters from the comics.
            <br/>
            <br/>
            “
            <a href="/title/tt16418896/">
             Gotham Knights
            </a>
            ” will be written and executive produced by
            <a href="/name/nm1241294/">
             Chad Fiveash
            </a>
            and James Stoteraux, with
            <a href="/name/nm0009219/">
             Natalie Abrams
            </a>
            as a writer and co-executive producer.
            <a href="/name/nm0075528/">
             Greg Berlanti
            </a>
            ,
            <a href="/name/nm1150863/">
             Sarah Schechter
            </a>
            and David Madden will executive produce for
            <a href="/company/co0330789/">
             Berlanti Productions
            </a>
            in association with
            <a href="/company/co0005035/">
             Warner Bros. Television
            </a>
            .
            <br/>
            <br/>
            Collins previously starred on
           </div>
           <a class="tracked-offsite-link" data-page-action="offsite-thewrap" data-page-const="" data-page-type="" data-ref="nwc_art_sm" data-subpage-type="" href="https://www.thewrap.com/misha-collins-supernatural-gotham-knights-harvey-dent/" onclick="window.imdb.trackOffsiteLink(this)" rel="" target="_blank">
            See full article at The Wrap
           </a>
           »
          </section>

         <article class="ipl-zebra-list__item news-article">
          <header class="news-article__header">
           <h2 class="news-article__title">
            <a class="tracked-offsite-link" data-page-action="offsite-thewrap" data-page-const="" data-page-type="" data-ref="nwc_art_hd" data-subpage-type="" href="https://www.thewrap.com/the-suicide-squad-daniela-melchior-fast-and-furious-10/" onclick="window.imdb.trackOffsiteLink(this)" rel="" target="_blank">
             ‘The Suicide Squad’ Breakout Daniela Melchior in Talks to Join ‘Fast and Furious 10’ (Exclusive)
            </a>
           </h2>
           <ul class="news-article__header-detail ipl-inline-list">
            <li class="ipl-inline-list__item news-article__date">
             21 March 2022
            </li>
            <li class="ipl-inline-list__item news-article__author">
             by Umberto Gonzalez
            </li>
            <li class="ipl-inline-list__item news-article__source">
             <a class="tracked-offsite-link" data-page-action="offsite-thewrap" data-page-const="" data-page-type="" data-ref="nwc_art_src" data-subpage-type="" href="https://www.thewrap.com/the-suicide-squad-daniela-melchior-fast-and-furious-10/" onclick="window.imdb.trackOffsiteLink(this)" rel="" target="_blank">
              The Wrap
             </a>
            </li>
           </ul>
          </header>
          <section class="news-article__body">
           <img alt="‘The Suicide Squad’ Breakout Daniela Melchior in Talks to Join ‘Fast and Furious 10’ (Exclusive)" class="news-article__image" src="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWIzZTYwOTAtN2UxNy00OTgzLWE5OTAtYzhjMTk4YTlhMzk5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTAyNDczMTA5._V1_SY150_CR7,0,100,150_AL_.jpg" srcset="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWIzZTYwOTAtN2UxNy00OTgzLWE5OTAtYzhjMTk4YTlhMzk5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTAyNDczMTA5._V1_SY300_CR15,0,200,300_AL_.jpg 2x, https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWIzZTYwOTAtN2UxNy00OTgzLWE5OTAtYzhjMTk4YTlhMzk5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTAyNDczMTA5._V1_SY450_CR23,0,300,450_AL_.jpg 3x, https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWIzZTYwOTAtN2UxNy00OTgzLWE5OTAtYzhjMTk4YTlhMzk5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTAyNDczMTA5._V1_SY600_CR31,0,400,600_AL_.jpg 4x"/>
           <div class="news-article__content">
            Portuguese actress
            <a href="/name/nm6403016/">
             Daniela Melchior
            </a>
            , who broke out playing Ratcatcher 2 in
            <a href="/name/nm0348181/">
             James Gunn
            </a>
            ’s “
            <a href="/title/tt6334354/">
             The Suicide Squad
            </a>
            ,” is in talks to join the cast of the 10th “
            <a href="/title/tt0232500/">
             Fast and Furious
            </a>
            ” movie alongside
            <a href="/name/nm0004874/">
             Vin Diesel
            </a>
            ,
            <a href="/company/co0569744/">
             TheWrap
            </a>
            has exclusively learned.
            <br/>
            <br/>
            Plot details for “Fast 10” are still being kept under wraps, as are any character details. Melchior joins new cast member
            <a href="/name/nm0597388/">
             Jason Momoa
            </a>
            who could reportedly star as one of the film’s villains in the action franchise.
            <br/>
            <br/>
            Diesel is set to return to the franchise along with
            <a href="/name/nm0735442/">
             Michelle Rodriguez
            </a>
            ,
            <a href="/name/nm0879085/">
             Tyrese Gibson
            </a>
            ,
            <a href="/name/nm0524839/">
             Ludacris
            </a>
            and
            <a href="/name/nm0437646/">
             Sung Kang
            </a>
            , as is director
            <a href="/name/nm0510912/">
             Justin Lin
            </a>
            . Diesel and Lin are also producing “Fast and Furious 10,” which is still untitled.
            <br/>
            <br/>
            <a href="/company/co0784875/">
             Universal
            </a>
            has “Fast and Furious 10” slated for release on May 19, 2023.
            <br/>
            <br/>
            Along with “
            <a href="/title/tt6334354/">
             The Suicide Squad
            </a>
            ,” Melchior also did the Portuguese dubbing voice for
            <a href="/name/nm9086797/">
             Gwen Stacy
            </a>
            in “
            <a href="/title/tt4633694/">
             Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
            </a>
            ,” which was originally voiced by
            <a href="/name/nm2794962/">
             Hailee Steinfeld
            </a>
            . Melchior will next
           </div>
           <a class="tracked-offsite-link" data-page-action="offsite-thewrap" data-page-const="" data-page-type="" data-ref="nwc_art_sm" data-subpage-type="" href="https://www.thewrap.com/the-suicide-squad-daniela-melchior-fast-and-furious-10/" onclick="window.imdb.trackOffsiteLink(this)" rel="" target="_blank">
            See full article at The Wrap
           </a>
           »
          </section>

         <article class="ipl-zebra-list__item news-article">
          <header class="news-article__header">
           <h2 class="news-article__title">
            <a class="tracked-offsite-link" data-page-action="offsite-thewrap" data-page-const="" data-page-type="" data-ref="nwc_art_hd" data-subpage-type="" href="https://www.thewrap.com/amanda-bynes-9-year-conservatorship-no-longer-needed-judge-says/" onclick="window.imdb.trackOffsiteLink(this)" rel="" target="_blank">
             Amanda Bynes’ 9-Year Conservatorship ‘No Longer Needed,’ Judge Says
            </a>
           </h2>
           <ul class="news-article__header-detail ipl-inline-list">
            <li class="ipl-inline-list__item news-article__date">
             22 March 2022
            </li>
            <li class="ipl-inline-list__item news-article__author">
             by Sharon Knolle
            </li>
            <li class="ipl-inline-list__item news-article__source">
             <a class="tracked-offsite-link" data-page-action="offsite-thewrap" data-page-const="" data-page-type="" data-ref="nwc_art_src" data-subpage-type="" href="https://www.thewrap.com/amanda-bynes-9-year-conservatorship-no-longer-needed-judge-says/" onclick="window.imdb.trackOffsiteLink(this)" rel="" target="_blank">
              The Wrap
             </a>
            </li>
           </ul>
          </header>
          <section class="news-article__body">
           <img alt="Amanda Bynes’ 9-Year Conservatorship ‘No Longer Needed,’ Judge Says" class="news-article__image" src="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjc0OTY0NDk5MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTM1ODY3Mg@@._V1_SX100_CR0,0,100,150_AL_.jpg" srcset="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjc0OTY0NDk5MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTM1ODY3Mg@@._V1_SX200_CR0,0,200,300_AL_.jpg 2x"/>
           <div class="news-article__content">
            A judge is expected to terminate Amanda Bynes’ conservatorship of nearly nine years after tentatively ruling on Monday that the former child star, now 35, no longer needs someone else to manage her personal and business affairs.
            <br/>
            <br/>
            “The court determines that the conservatorship is no longer required and that grounds for establishment of a conservatorship of the person no longer exist,” Judge Roger L. Lund of Ventura County Superior Court wrote Monday in the tentative ruling, obtained by
            <a href="/company/co0569744/">
             TheWrap
            </a>
            .
            <br/>
            <br/>
            Bynes filed last month to end the conservatorship, which was put in place after exhibiting erratic behavior in 2013 such as setting a driveway on fire. Her mother Lynn has been her conservator since October 2014 and is fully in support of ending the arrangement, according to
            <a href="/name/nm12644218/">
             Tamar Arminak
            </a>
            , an attorney for her parents.
            <br/>
            <br/>
            Bynes’ representatives didn’t immediately respond to a request for comment from TheWrap.
            <br/>
            <br/>
            Arminak told
            <a href="/company/co0095173/">
             NBC News
            </a>
            in February that
           </div>
           <a class="tracked-offsite-link" data-page-action="offsite-thewrap" data-page-const="" data-page-type="" data-ref="nwc_art_sm" data-subpage-type="" href="https://www.thewrap.com/amanda-bynes-9-year-conservatorship-no-longer-needed-judge-says/" onclick="window.imdb.trackOffsiteLink(this)" rel="" target="_blank">
            See full article at The Wrap
           </a>
           »

             24 March 2022

            <li class="ipl-inline-list__item news-article__source">
             <a class="tracked-offsite-link" data-page-action="offsite-variety" data-page-const="" data-page-type="" data-ref="nwc_art_src" data-subpage-type="" href="https://variety.com/2022/film/news/new-zealand-film-festival-reduced-size-1235213283/" onclick="window.imdb.trackOffsiteLink(this)" rel="" target="_blank">
              Variety - Film News
             </a>
            </li>
           </ul>
          </header>
          <section class="news-article__body">
           <img alt="New Zealand Film Festival Plans Reduced-Size In-Person Edition" class="news-article__image" src="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGUxNWI0NDMtYWI1Ni00NGFmLWFkM2UtNTMzMGQ4OWEwODM5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTE0MzQwMjgz._V1_SY150_CR83,0,100,150_AL_.jpg" srcset="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGUxNWI0NDMtYWI1Ni00NGFmLWFkM2UtNTMzMGQ4OWEwODM5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTE0MzQwMjgz._V1_SY300_CR166,0,200,300_AL_.jpg 2x, https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGUxNWI0NDMtYWI1Ni00NGFmLWFkM2UtNTMzMGQ4OWEwODM5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTE0MzQwMjgz._V1_SY450_CR249,0,300,450_AL_.jpg 3x"/>
           <div class="news-article__content">
            The New Zealand International Film Festival will return to an in-person event this year, but in a scaled-down format. It will operate in multiple cities between July 28 and Sept. 4, 2022.
            <br/>
            <br/>
            Management explained the downsizing as both a reaction to the impact of Covid-19 and as a means to bouncing back bigger in 2023.
            <br/>
            <br/>
            It operated as a hybrid festival in 2020 and then in 2021 in cinemas in 11 towns and cities. But it was forced to cancel screenings in Auckland and Hamilton due to the last year’s lockdowns. Capacity reductions in other venues “had a significant impact on our gross revenue.”
            <br/>
            <br/>
            The 2022 festival will visit Auckland, Hamilton, Tauranga, Hawke’s Bay, New Plymouth, Palmerston North, Masterton, Wellington, Nelson, Christchurch, Timaru, Dunedin and Gore.
            <br/>
            <br/>
            The temporary format means fewer films, fewer venues (particularly in Auckland and Wellington), a shorter duration in each city, a smaller team delivering the festival and reduced above-the-line marketing activity.
           </div>
           <a class="tracked-offsite-link" data-page-action="offsite-variety" data-page-const="" data-page-type="" data-ref="nwc_art_sm" data-subpage-type="" href="https://variety.com/2022/film/news/new-zealand-film-festival-reduced-size-1235213283/" onclick="window.imdb.trackOffsiteLink(this)" rel="" target="_blank">
            See full article at Variety - Film News
           </a>

         <article class="ipl-zebra-list__item news-article">
          <header class="news-article__header">
           <h2 class="news-article__title">
            <a class="tracked-offsite-link" data-page-action="offsite-variety" data-page-const="" data-page-type="" data-ref="nwc_art_hd" data-subpage-type="" href="https://variety.com/2022/tv/global/bbc-funding-ukraine-1235213278/" onclick="window.imdb.trackOffsiteLink(this)" rel="" target="_blank">
             BBC Receives Additional U.K. Government Funding to Counter Ukraine War Disinformation
            </a>
           </h2>
           <ul class="news-article__header-detail ipl-inline-list">
            <li class="ipl-inline-list__item news-article__date">
             24 March 2022
            </li>
            <li class="ipl-inline-list__item news-article__author">
             by Naman Ramachandran
            </li>
            <li class="ipl-inline-list__item news-article__source">
             <a class="tracked-offsite-link" data-page-action="offsite-variety" data-page-const="" data-page-type="" data-ref="nwc_art_src" data-subpage-type="" href="https://variety.com/2022/tv/global/bbc-funding-ukraine-1235213278/" onclick="window.imdb.trackOffsiteLink(this)" rel="" target="_blank">
              Variety - TV News
             </a>
            </li>
           </ul>
          </header>
          <section class="news-article__body">
           <img alt="BBC Receives Additional U.K. Government Funding to Counter Ukraine War Disinformation" class="news-article__image" src="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzRjMGU0YmItNjA3ZC00YzI5LThkMGQtZTJlOGNhMWI4OGQzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTE0MzQwMjgz._V1_SY150_CR83,0,100,150_AL_.jpg" srcset="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzRjMGU0YmItNjA3ZC00YzI5LThkMGQtZTJlOGNhMWI4OGQzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTE0MzQwMjgz._V1_SY300_CR166,0,200,300_AL_.jpg 2x, https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzRjMGU0YmItNjA3ZC00YzI5LThkMGQtZTJlOGNhMWI4OGQzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTE0MzQwMjgz._V1_SY450_CR249,0,300,450_AL_.jpg 3x"/>
           <div class="news-article__content">
            The
            <a href="/company/co0377087/">
             BBC World Service
            </a>
            has sought and will receive £4.1 million ($5.4 million) in additional funding to counter disinformation around the ongoing Russian invasion of Ukraine.
            <br/>
            <br/>
            The emergency funding would to help the
            <a href="/company/co0843630/">
             BBC
            </a>
            “continue bringing independent, impartial and accurate news to people in Ukraine and Russia in the face of increased propaganda from the Russian state,” the U.K. government said in a statement.
            <br/>
            <br/>
            On March 4, the BBC temporarily suspended its Russian journalism operations following the introduction of new laws that could see journalists fined, imprisoned or even punished with “forced labor” for reporting on the country’s assault of Ukraine.
           </div>

           <div class="news-article__content">
            At a time when journalists are under attack in many parts of the world and the odious term “fake news” has become part of the global lexicon, Spain’s
            <a href="/company/co0777067/">
             Mediacrest
            </a>
            presents the topical drama series “
            <a href="/title/tt0119008/">

            <br/>

            <a href="/name/nm0273832/">
             Gustavo Ferrada

            <a href="/title/tt0119008/">
             Fake
            </a>
            ” is one of five selected projects from leading Spanish production companies seeking European partners, comprising Fedent España,
            <a href="/company/co0271211/">
             Friki Films
            </a>
            ,
            <a href="/company/co0228658/">

            </a>

            <br/>
            Created in-house
           </div>

           <h2 class="news-article__title">
            <a class="tracked-offsite-link" data-page-action="offsite-variety" data-page-const="" data-page-type="" data-ref="nwc_art_hd" data-subpage-type="" href="https://variety.com/2022/global/asia/australian-series-bad-behaviour-jana-mckinnon-1235213223/" onclick="window.imdb.trackOffsiteLink(this)" rel="" target="_blank">
             All-Female Australian Series ‘Bad Behaviour’ Adds Jana McKinnon as Star
            </a>
           </h2>
           <ul class="news-article__header-detail ipl-inline-list">
            <li class="ipl-inline-list__item news-article__date">
             24 March 2022
            </li>
            <li class="ipl-inline-list__item news-article__author">
             by Patrick Frater
            </li>
            <li class="ipl-inline-list__item news-article__source">
             <a class="tracked-offsite-link" data-page-action="offsite-variety" data-page-const="" data-page-type="" data-ref="nwc_art_src" data-subpage-type="" href="https://variety.com/2022/global/asia/australian-series-bad-behaviour-jana-mckinnon-1235213223/" onclick="window.imdb.trackOffsiteLink(this)" rel="" target="_blank">
              Variety - TV News
             </a>
            </li>
           </ul>
          </header>
          <section class="news-article__body">
           <img alt="All-Female Australian Series ‘Bad Behaviour’ Adds Jana McKinnon as Star" class="news-article__image" src="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjAzOTk0NWEtMGJiZS00NjM3LWE1Y2YtMDI2NmI1MjUyMGVlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTE0MzQwMjgz._V1_SY150_CR83,0,100,150_AL_.jpg" srcset="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjAzOTk0NWEtMGJiZS00NjM3LWE1Y2YtMDI2NmI1MjUyMGVlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTE0MzQwMjgz._V1_SY300_CR167,0,200,300_AL_.jpg 2x, https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjAzOTk0NWEtMGJiZS00NjM3LWE1Y2YtMDI2NmI1MjUyMGVlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTE0MzQwMjgz._V1_SY450_CR250,0,300,450_AL_.jpg 3x"/>
           <div class="news-article__content">
            <a href="/name/nm3317244/">
             Jana McKinnon
            </a>
            ,
            <a href="/name/nm9220161/">
             Markella Kavenagh
            </a>
            and
            <a href="/name/nm8485169/">
             Yerin Ha
            </a>
            have joined the cast of Australian TV series “Bad Behaviour.”
            <br/>
            <br/>
            Filming of the four-part show, which is adapted from the acclaimed book of the same name by writer
            <a href="/name/nm13513136/">
             Rebecca Starford
            </a>
            , has now completed in Victoria, Australia. It is expected to play on Australian streaming platform
            <a href="/company/co0523322/">
             Stan
            </a>
            later this year.
            <br/>
            <br/>
            McKinnon (“We Children of Bahnhof Zoo”) stars as scholarship student, who arrives at Silver Creek for a year of character building at the wilderness campus of an exclusive girl’s boarding school. Instead, she finds herself in a dormitory of the most volatile and the most vulnerable.
           </div>
